main event: A UFO incident labeled as 1747 was reported by a civilian in Monte Vista, Colorado in December 1948.
interesting points: The incident was labeled with a specific number, indicating a systematic categorization of UFO reports.
It involved a civilian witness, adding credibility to the report.
The report includes the date and location of the UFO sighting, providing specific details for further investigation.
The document contains standard fields for recording the length of observation and local time, indicating a structured approach to data collection.
The classification of the report as 'UNCLASSIFIED' suggests a level of transparency in the handling of UFO documentation.
